All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractPiece
An abstract class that implements the Piece interface.
AbstractStatsController
The generic controller for Stats, you must extend this class in order to create your personalized controller based on view.
Bishop
A Bishop class that extends AbstractPiece abstract class.
BoardController
Controller class for Board.fxml.
BoardControllerUtils
An utility class for the BoardController.
Castling
This interface models and handles all Castling controls.
CastlingImpl
Implementation of Castling Interface's methods.
Chessboard
Interface for a simple chessboard.
ChessboardFactory
interface for ChessboardFactory.
ChessboardFactoryImpl
This class create different types of chessboard for different types of game modes.
ChessTimer
This Interface builds a chess timer.
ChessTimerImpl
Implementation of ChessTimer Interface's methods.
ColorSettings
An enum used to handle the game theme.
ControlCheck
In chess, no move can be made that makes the king, of the player who is moving, checkmate.
ControlCheckImpl
Simple implementation of ControlCheck.
ControllerUtils
It's a utility class that contains methods that are used by multiple controllers.
ControlsUtility
A Piece utility class.
DatabaseFilters
The class has methods for filtering data in the database.
EndGame
This Interface models and handles all the possible ways a chess game can end with.
EndGameImpl
Implementation of EndGame Interface's methods.
Fen
An Interface for represent a position reached during a game of chess.
FenBuilder
An implementation of Fen.
FenConverter
Interface for converting a Chessboard in a string fen.
FenConverterImpl
An implementation of FenConverter.
Game
Interface for GameImpl.
GameImpl
The main class of the game, it manage a match user vs user.
GuiPiece
The GuiPiece class defines the piece you see on the chessboard.
GuiPieceFactory
Simple interface for GuiPieceFactoryImpl.
GuiPieceFactoryImpl
A factory for the creation of guiPiece from a piece.
IllegalMoveException
This exception is thrown when trying to rebuild a move via the movebuilder.
JsonDeserializer
An interface to deserialize in a generic object.
JsonDeserializerImpl
An implementation of deserializer, this is used to deserialize a list of game.
JsonFileReader
An iterface for reading from files.
JsonFileReaderImpl
An implementation of JsonFileReader, this is used to read a list of game from file.
JsonFileWriter
A class to save an object in a file.
JsonFileWriterImpl
An implementation of JsonFileWriter, this is used to write a List of game to file.
JsonSerializer
An interface to serialize an object.
JsonSerializerImpl
An implementation of JsonSerializer, this is used to serialize a generic object.
JsonUtils
This class has utils methods for input/output classes.
King
A King class that extends AbstractPiece abstract class.
KingNotFoundException
This exception is thrown when the king is not found in the list of piece.
Knight
A Knight class that extends AbstractPiece abstract class.
Launcher
This class is the application's starting point.
MatchDuration
This Enum contains all possible stopwatch choices for the game.
MenuController
This class controls the Menu and the related FXML files.
Move
This interface is used to convert a move into a string.
MoveBuilder
An implementation of Move to convert a move to String represented by algebric notation.
Name
A standard enum class for the pieces names.
Numbers
This class represents the numbers on the board.
Pair<X,Y>
A generic Pair.
Pawn
A Pawn class that extends AbstractPiece abstract class.
Piece
A standard interface for a Piece object.
PieceDirections
This enum contains the standard directions a Piece can go to.
PieceFactory
A standard interface for a Piece Factory.
PieceFactoryImpl
Implementation of PieceFactory interface.
PieceImagePath
Enum for piece image path.
PieceMovement
This interface contains methods used by the pieces in order to generate the list of possible positions.
PieceMovementImpl
Implementation of PieceMovement Interface.
Position
A standard Position class, with getters, hashCode, equals, and toString.
Promotion
An interface for the pawn's promotion.
PromotionImpl
The Pawn promotion class, implements Promotion.
Queen
A Queen class that extends AbstractPiece abstract class.
Rook
A Rook class that extends AbstractPiece abstract class.
Side
A standard enum class for the Piece side.
Start
This class sets up the GUI for the Main Menu of the application.
StatsController
Controller for updating stats view.
TimerPlayer
This interface models a Player with its own Timer.
TimerPlayerImpl
Implementation of the TimerPlayer Interface's method.
Triple<T,U,V>
A generic Triple.
TutorialController
This class handles the Tutorial GUI and its functionalities.
User
User interface for UserImpl.
UserController
Generic interface of userControllerImpl.
UserControllerImpl
A class that manage user in GUI, it extends user and has user image.
UserHandlerController
It manage the selection of the name and image of the two users before starting the game.
UserImpl
Contain information about user during the game.
